original: yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par sgrub pa'o //
translated: Correct generation is the accomplishment.

original: lam zhes bya ba ni gnyen pos zin pa mngon par 'byung ba'i lam mo //
analyzed: lam zhes bya ba ni gnyen pos zin pa mngon par 'byung ba'i lam mo //
translated: The path is the path of departure that is embraced by the antidote.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gzhan dang 'jig rten pa'i mngon par 'byung ba'i lam las gzhan du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gzhan dang 'jig rten pa'i mngon par 'byung ba'i lam las gzhan du gyur pa'o //
translated: The other is the supramundane path, which is different from the mundane path of renunciation.

original: bsam pa zhes @242b bya ba ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa zhes @242b bya ba ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: The intention is the practice.

original: khyad bar zhes bya ba ni lam gzhan brtsams pa de yon tan bzhis khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
analyzed: khyad bar zhes bya ba ni lam gzhan brtsams pa de yon tan bzhis khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
translated: The distinction is that the other path is superior to the mundane path by four qualities:

original: longs spyod dang / lus kyi khyad par gyi rgyur gyur pa dang / nyes par spyod pa las kun du bsrung ba'i rgyur gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du bsrung ba'i rgyur gyur pa dang / sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: longs spyod dang / lus kyi khyad par gyi rgyur gyur pa dang / nyes par spyod pa las kun du bsrung ba'i rgyur gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba kun du bsrung ba'i rgyur gyur pa dang / sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa ste /
translated: it is the cause of the distinction of enjoyment and body, it is the cause of protection from immorality, it is the cause of protection of the roots of wholesomeness, and it is the cause of benefit to sentient beings.

original: de la 'bad pa ni gnyen po bsgom pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'bad pa ni gnyen po bsgom pa yin no //
translated: The effort is the cultivation of the antidote.

original: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu thob pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu thob pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the attainment of the result of cultivation?

original: de yang 'thob pa'o zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: de yang 'thob pa'o zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: It is also attainment, as stated.

original: sa bdun pa la de'i rnam bar g-yeng ba'i gnyen po rnam par gzhag pa dang / zung du 'brel ba'i lam rab tu 'thob pa rnam par gzhag pa dang / sa snga phyi'i khyad par rnam par gzhag pa dang / de'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pas gnas pa dang /
analyzed: sa bdun pa la de'i rnam bar g-yeng ba'i gnyen po rnam par gzhag pa dang / zung du 'brel ba'i lam rab tu 'thob pa rnam par gzhag pa dang / sa snga phyi'i khyad par rnam par gzhag pa dang / de'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pas gnas pa dang /
translated: On the seventh stage, the bodhisattva is situated in the antidotes to the distractions of that stage, in the attainment of the path of union, in the distinction of the earlier and later stages, and in the result of that stage.

original: 'bras bu legs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par bstan pa 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu legs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par bstan pa 'thob pa'o //
translated: He obtains the teaching of the distinction of the excellent result.

original: de la de'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: de la de'i rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnyen po rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The antidotes to the distractions of that stage are twofold:

original: zhi ba'i shas che ba'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med pa'i rnam pa bsgom pa dang thabs kyi shas che ba'i gnyen por mngon par 'byed pa med pa'i lam la sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: zhi ba'i shas che ba'i gnyen por de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med pa'i rnam pa bsgom pa dang thabs kyi shas che ba'i gnyen por mngon par 'byed pa med pa'i lam la sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The antidote to the predominance of tranquility is the cultivation of the immeasurable objects of the tathagatas. The antidote to the predominance of the means is the application to the path of nondifferentiation.

original: zung du 'brel pa'i lam rab tu thob pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: zung du 'brel pa'i lam rab tu thob pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The attainment of the path of union is fourfold:

original: gnyis cig car rgyun du 'byung ba dang / mos pa rnam par gzhag pa'i khyad par dang / don chen po byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rab tu dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis cig car rgyun du 'byung ba dang / mos pa rnam par gzhag pa'i khyad par dang / don chen po byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs rab tu dbye ba'o //
translated: the simultaneous occurrence of the two, the distinctive arrangement of devotion, the performance of great benefits, and the classification of the factors of enlightenment.

original: de la gnyis cig car rgyun du 'byung bas zhes bya ba ni skad cig gcig la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gnyis mngon sum du byed cing spyod lam thams cad du de dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de la gnyis cig car rgyun du 'byung bas zhes bya ba ni skad cig gcig la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gnyis mngon sum du byed cing spyod lam thams cad du de dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The simultaneous occurrence of the two means that in a single moment one actualizes the paths of serenity and insight and is endowed with them in all activities.

original: mos pa rnam par dag pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med pas spyod lam thams cad la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i 'du shes yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral ba yin no //
analyzed: mos pa rnam par dag pa'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa med pas spyod lam thams cad la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med pa'i rnam pa de lta bu'i 'du shes yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral ba yin no //
translated: The distinctive arrangement of devotion means that, due to the absence of obscurations, one is never separated from the attention of the perception of the immeasurable objective realm of the Tathagatas, while abiding in all activities.

original: don chen po byed pa zhes bya ba ni sems bskyed pa re re la yang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yang dag par sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: don chen po byed pa zhes bya ba ni sems bskyed pa re re la yang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yang dag par sgrub pa'o //
translated: The performance of great benefits means that in each instant of mind one accomplishes the ten perfections.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen por gtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par gtegs @243a * //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen por gtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par gtegs @243a * //
translated: The chapter on the classification of the elements leading to enlightenment is the perfections belonging to the Great Vehicle and bringing sentient beings to maturity.üîΩ

original: pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par rtogs pa'i bden pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang / shes bya'i sgrib ba rnam par dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos thams cad skad cig la yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag par rtogs pa'i bden pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams dang / shes bya'i sgrib ba rnam par dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi chos thams cad skad cig la yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The division of the factors of enlightenment is the complete perfection in a single instant of all the factors of enlightenment, which are the perfections included in the Great Vehicle, the means of gathering disciples, the realization of the truths for the purification of the obscurations of the afflictions, the factors of enlightenment and doors of liberation, and all the factors of enlightenment for the realization of the purification of the obscurations to omniscience.

original: sa snga phyi'i khyad par rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni sa bdun pa 'di sa 'og ma rnams las khyad zhugs pa dang / sa gong ma bas dman par bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sa snga phyi'i khyad par rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni sa bdun pa 'di sa 'og ma rnams las khyad zhugs pa dang / sa gong ma bas dman par bstan pa'o //
translated: The presentation of the distinctions between the earlier and later grounds is the teaching that this seventh ground is distinguished from the lower grounds and is inferior to the higher grounds.

original: de la 'og ma rnams las khyad zhugs pa'i zhes bya ba ni sa bdun pa la sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa gnon pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'og ma rnams las khyad zhugs pa'i zhes bya ba ni sa bdun pa la sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i spyod pa gnon pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase superior to the lower ones means that the seventh stage is superior to the lower stages because it is the stage of direct action, since it is the stage of the perfection of wisdom, and because it is the stage of the perfection of vows, since it is the stage of the perfection of the vows of the bodhisattva.

original: sa gong ma bas dman pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes mngon par sgrub par sbyor ba'i yan lag rnams 'bad pa dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa gong ma bas dman pa zhes bya ba ni ye shes mngon par sgrub par sbyor ba'i yan lag rnams 'bad pa dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The phrase inferior to the higher ones means that the seventh stage is inferior to the higher stages because the branches of application for the realization of wisdom are not yet perfected.

original: de'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni zung du 'brel pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni zung du 'brel pa'i lam gyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa bzhi ste /
translated: The establishment of the result of the path of union is fourfold:

original: las rnam par dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par thob pa dang sa las shin tu 'das pa dang / gnas pa'i khyad par thob pa'o //
analyzed: las rnam par dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par thob pa dang sa las shin tu 'das pa dang / gnas pa'i khyad par thob pa'o //
translated: the purification of karma, the attainment of the special meditative concentration, the transcendence of the stage, and the attainment of the special abode.

original: de la las rnam par dag pa la yang bzhi ste //
analyzed: de la las rnam par dag pa la yang bzhi ste //
translated: The purification of karma is fourfold:

original: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i khyad par dad /
analyzed: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i khyad par dad /
translated: the special purity of morality,

original: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam par dag pa'i khyad par dang / bsam pa sbyor bas mnyam pa med pa'i lus kyi khyad par thob pa dang / bsam gtan la sogs pa mngon sum du byed pa'i khyad par gyis nus pa'i khyad par thob pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i shes pa rnam par dag pa'i khyad par dang / bsam pa sbyor bas mnyam pa med pa'i lus kyi khyad par thob pa dang / bsam gtan la sogs pa mngon sum du byed pa'i khyad par gyis nus pa'i khyad par thob pa'o //
translated: The special attainment of the power of the knowledge of the right and wrong paths is the special attainment of the power of the knowledge of the right and wrong paths through the ten right and wrong paths, such as the right and wrong paths of morality.üîΩThe special attainment of the power of the knowledge of the practice of the path is the special attainment of the power of the knowledge of the practice of the path through the ten practices of the path, such as the practice of the path of the ≈õrƒÅvaka.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par thob pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'byed pas shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyorüîΩbar byed pa brgya stong phrag bcu la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par thob pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'byed pas shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyorüîΩbar byed pa brgya stong phrag bcu la snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
translated: The special attainment of the power of the knowledge of the accomplishment of the purpose is the special attainment of the power of the knowledge of the accomplishment of the purpose through the ten accomplishments of the purpose, such as the accomplishment of the purpose of the pratyekabuddha.

original: sa las shin tu 'das pa zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob nas snying brtse ba dang / snying rje'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las shin tu 'das pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i @243b sa brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: sa las shin tu 'das pa zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob nas snying brtse ba dang / snying rje'i stobs kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las shin tu 'das pa dang / shes rab dang ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i @243b sa brgyad pa dang /
translated: The line it is beyond the levels means that once one has attained that samƒÅdhi, which is purified by means of wisdom and method, through the power of compassion and loving kindness, one goes beyond the levels of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and one approaches the eighth bodhisattva level, which is analyzed by wisdom and gnosis.

original: nye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: nye bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: It is the level of direct encounter.

original: gnas pa'i khyad par thob pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed pa dang / srid pa mi gtong bas gnas pa'i khyad par thob pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa'i khyad par thob pa zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa dang / 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed pa dang / srid pa mi gtong bas gnas pa'i khyad par thob pa yin no //
translated: The line it is the attainment of the distinctive state means that one attains the distinctive state of abiding in the perfect endpoint, while not actualizing cessation, and not abandoning existence.

original: 'bras bu legs pa'i khyad par ni snga ma bzhin no ;
analyzed: 'bras bu legs pa'i khyad par ni snga ma bzhin no ;
translated: The distinctive result is the same as before.

original: / gnas pa dang khyad par de dag thob pas na de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: / gnas pa dang khyad par de dag thob pas na de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhes gsungs te /
translated: The line it is the completion of that factor means that one completes that factor by attaining that state and that distinctive state.

original: mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is utterly beyond the occurrence of subtle signs.

original: sa brgyad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sa brgyad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the elimination of the counteragent on the eighth level?

original: de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs pa yin te ;
analyzed: de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs pa yin te ;
translated: It is complete in that branch,

original: mtshan ma med par rnam pa de la rtsol ba lhag par btang snyoms su gzhag pa dang / mtshan ma la dbang thob par mi nus pas zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: mtshan ma med par rnam pa de la rtsol ba lhag par btang snyoms su gzhag pa dang / mtshan ma la dbang thob par mi nus pas zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: because it is the superior equanimity of effort in that aspect of signlessness and because it is not able to attain mastery over signs.

original: sa brgyad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni mtshan ma med pa nyid du mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni mtshan ma med pa nyid du mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
translated: The counteragent to the eighth level is the manifest activity of signlessness.üîΩMoreover, on the seventh level, the bodhisattva is in the superior wisdom. In terms of the previous three, he is in the manifest activity of signlessness and the effort of signlessness.

original: de yang sa bdun pa la lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa snga ma de gsum gyi dbang du byas nas mngon par 'du byed pa dang rtsol bas rgyun chags su bar chad med par chos thams cad la de bzhin nyid la rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes
analyzed: de yang sa bdun pa la lhag pa'i shes rab la gnas pa snga ma de gsum gyi dbang du byas nas mngon par 'du byed pa dang rtsol bas rgyun chags su bar chad med par chos thams cad la de bzhin nyid la rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes
translated: He is in the uninterrupted continuity of the nonconceptual wisdom of suchness with regard to all phenomena.

original: rab sgom pa dang ldan pa la gnas su zin kyang rang gi dang nyid kyis rgyun chags su bar chad med par 'jug pa'i lam dang ldan pa la gnas par mi nus pa nyid yin par sbyar ro //
analyzed: rab sgom pa dang ldan pa la gnas su zin kyang rang gi dang nyid kyis rgyun chags su bar chad med par 'jug pa'i lam dang ldan pa la gnas par mi nus pa nyid yin par sbyar ro //
translated: Even though one abides in the perfection of meditative realization, one is not yet able to abide in the path of uninterrupted meditative realization through one's own inclination.

original: gnyen po sgom pa gang zhen /
analyzed: gnyen po sgom pa gang zhen /
translated: What is the realization of the counteragent?

original: de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pas zhes bya bas bstan te /üîΩsa bdun pa nas brgyad par 'phar pa'i gnas skabs na yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa bsdus pa zhes bya bas sa bdun po spyi dang so sos bsdus pa'i yon tan thob pa des rnam par dag pa'i bzod pa thob pa zhes bya ba ni mi skye
analyzed: de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pas zhes bya bas bstan te / sa bdun pa nas brgyad par 'phar pa'i gnas skabs na yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa bsdus pa zhes bya bas sa bdun po spyi dang so sos bsdus pa'i yon tan thob pa des rnam par dag pa'i bzod pa thob pa zhes bya ba ni mi skye
translated: It is taught by the words: because of striving for the fulfilment of that stage.

original: ba'i chos la bzod pa'i dmigs pa thob bas sa bdun pa las 'phar zhing brgyad pa gnon par 'gyur ba de la 'bad pa'o //
analyzed: ba'i chos la bzod pa'i dmigs pa thob bas sa bdun pa las 'phar zhing brgyad pa gnon par 'gyur ba de la 'bad pa'o //
translated: In the situation of the leap from the seventh to the eighth stage, he who has attained the tolerance of the noncreation of things, which is the attainment of the pure tolerance, by means of the attainment of the virtues common to and specific of the seven stages, which are included in the stage of complete purification, strives for the leap to the eighth stage by means of the attainment of the objective support of the tolerance of the noncreation of things.

original: de la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun po dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la 'jug pa na sbyor ba can gyi spyodüîΩpa la 'jug pa'i sa @244a * //üîΩyongs su sbyang ba byas pa bdun po dag yongs su sbyangs pas sa bdun po dag gi sa'i yon tan thams cad thob pa'o //
analyzed: de la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun po dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la 'jug pa na sbyor ba can gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa'i sa @244a * // yongs su sbyang ba byas pa bdun po dag yongs su sbyangs pas sa bdun po dag gi sa'i yon tan thams cad thob pa'o //
translated: The stage of entering into activity is the stage of the bodhisattva who has entered the eighth bodhisattva stage.

original: sa bdun po spyi dang so sos bsdus pa'i yon tan thob pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sa bdun po spyi dang so sos bsdus pa'i yon tan thob pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: The stage of complete purification is the stage of the bodhisattva who has completed the training on the seven bodhisattva stages. When he enters the eighth bodhisattva stage, he enters the stage of the one who is endowed with application.üîΩThe stage of entering into activity is the stage of the bodhisattva who has entered the eighth bodhisattva stage.

original: sa bdun po spyis bsdus pa'i yon tan thob pa zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa rnam pa gnyis gong nas gong du rab tu rtogs pa dang / thabs kyis bsdus pa'i shes rab kyis mi gnas pa'i lam de yongs su sbyong ba dang / sbyor bas bsdus pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yon tan thob pa'o //
analyzed: sa bdun po spyis bsdus pa'i yon tan thob pa zhes bya ba ni bdag med pa rnam pa gnyis gong nas gong du rab tu rtogs pa dang / thabs kyis bsdus pa'i shes rab kyis mi gnas pa'i lam de yongs su sbyong ba dang / sbyor bas bsdus pa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i yon tan thob pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the qualities subsumed by the seven grounds is the ever increasing realization of the two kinds of absence of self entity and the attainment of the qualities of thoroughly purifying the path of nonabiding through the wisdom subsumed by the method and of perfecting the accumulations subsumed by the application.

original: sa bdun po so sos bsdus pa'i yon tan thob pa zhes bya ba ni sa dang po la smon lam shin tu btab pa la sogs pa dang sa gnyis pa la de lta bas na bdag gi mngon par sgrub tu 'dra ba la rnam pa thams cad yongs
analyzed: sa bdun po so sos bsdus pa'i yon tan thob pa zhes bya ba ni sa dang po la smon lam shin tu btab pa la sogs pa dang sa gnyis pa la de lta bas na bdag gi mngon par sgrub tu 'dra ba la rnam pa thams cad yongs
translated: The attainment of the qualities subsumed by each of the seven grounds is the attainment of the qualities of the first ground such as the extremely vast aspirations and so on, the attainment of the qualities of the second ground such as the extremely pure superior intention and so on, the attainment of the qualities of the third ground such as the extremely pure superior wisdom and so on, the attainment of the qualities of the fourth ground such as the extremely pure superior diligence and so on, the attainment of the qualities of the fifth ground such as the extremely pure superior mindfulness and so on, the attainment of the qualities of the sixth ground such as the extremely pure superior concentration and so on and the attainment of the qualities of the seventh ground such as the extremely pure superior wisdom and so on.

original: su sbyang zhing mngon par sgrub pa nyid la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sa gsum pa la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las mi nyams pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa thob pa'i phyir rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa
analyzed: su sbyang zhing mngon par sgrub pa nyid la brtson par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sa gsum pa la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba las mi nyams pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa thob pa'i phyir rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa
translated: They should strive to train and accomplish the transcendent perfections and so on.üîΩOn the third level, they acquire the power of their own sources of good, because they acquire the concentration of freedom from worldly attachment and so on.üîΩOn the fourth level, they acquire the attention of the buddha qualities, because they acquire the Dharma that brings their gnosis to maturity and the special purity of the obscurations to be eliminated on the path of seeing.

original: thob pa dang / sa bzhi pa la ye shes yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos thob pas shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yid la bya ba dang ldan pa dang / sa lnga pa la rnam par dag pa la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i brnag pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
analyzed: thob pa dang / sa bzhi pa la ye shes yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos thob pas shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i khyad par gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yid la bya ba dang ldan pa dang / sa lnga pa la rnam par dag pa la sems kyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i brnag pa shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
translated: On the fifth level, they acquire the completely pure superior intention, because their attitude of mind with regard to purity is the same.

original: sa drug pa la dus gsum gyi snying rje'i khyad par yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phra mo'i rnam pa thams cad la rtog pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa dang / sa bdun pa la lam gzhan brtsams pa'i khyad par rnams kyis sems can rnams la sbyor ba mi gtong ba dang /
analyzed: sa drug pa la dus gsum gyi snying rje'i khyad par yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phra mo'i rnam pa thams cad la rtog pas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis mngon par 'phags pa dang / sa bdun pa la lam gzhan brtsams pa'i khyad par rnams kyis sems can rnams la sbyor ba mi gtong ba dang /
translated: On the seventh ground, they never give up their application to sentient beings through the distinctive features of their engagement in other paths.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med pa'i rnam pa bsgoms pa la sogs pa'i yon tan ji skad bstan pa thams cad 'dis thob pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul tshad med pa'i rnam pa bsgoms pa la sogs pa'i yon tan ji skad bstan pa thams cad 'dis thob pa'o //
translated: And they attain all the qualities that have been taught, such as the cultivation of the aspects of the immeasurable domain of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: rnam par dag pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba ni sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i tshul khong du chud par gyur pa'i dmigs pa'i chos thob pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa zhes bya ba ni sa brgyad pa la mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i tshul khong du chud par gyur pa'i dmigs pa'i chos thob pa'o //
translated: The attainment of the acceptance of purification refers to the attainment of the object of observation of the acceptance of the non-arising of phenomena on the eighth ground.

original: mi skye ba'i @244b chos la bzod pa'i dmigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: mi skye ba'i @244b chos la bzod pa'i dmigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The attainment of the object of observation of the acceptance of the non-arising of phenomena refers to the four types of non-arising.

original: yod pa mi skye ba dang / rang bzhin mi skye ba dang / grangs tha dad pa mi skye ba dang // las tha dad pa mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: yod pa mi skye ba dang / rang bzhin mi skye ba dang / grangs tha dad pa mi skye ba dang // las tha dad pa mi skye ba'o //
translated: Non-arising of the existent, non-arising of the intrinsic nature, non-arising of the different enumerations, and non-arising of the different actions.

original: de la yod pa mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis yod par brtags pa rnam pa bdun po rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams snga nas yod pa dang / gsar du skye ba yod pa dang / mtshan nyid yod pa dang /
analyzed: de la yod pa mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyis yod par brtags pa rnam pa bdun po rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams snga nas yod pa dang / gsar du skye ba yod pa dang / mtshan nyid yod pa dang /
translated: Non-arising of the existent refers to the non-arising of the seven types of existence imagined by others, such as the existence of the factors of purification from the beginning, the existence of new arising, the existence of characteristics,

original: tha ma'i mtha' yod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyi thog ma'i mtha' yod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi mtha' rdzogs pa yod pa dang rnam par byang nas kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par brtags pa de dag mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: tha ma'i mtha' yod pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyi thog ma'i mtha' yod pa dang / sems can rnams kyi mtha' rdzogs pa yod pa dang rnam par byang nas kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par brtags pa de dag mi skye ba'o //
translated: the existence of a final end, the existence of an initial end of the factors of affliction, the existence of the completion of the end of sentient beings, and the existence of affliction after purification.

original: rang bzhin mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa'i rang bzhin mi skye ba'o //
translated: Non-arising of the intrinsic nature refers to the non-arising of the intrinsic nature of the selflessness of phenomena.

original: grangs tha dad pa'i mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dus gsum du 'bri ba dang / 'phel ba'i grangs tha dad pa mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: grangs tha dad pa'i mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dus gsum du 'bri ba dang / 'phel ba'i grangs tha dad pa mi skye ba'o //
translated: Non-production of a different number refers to the non-production of a different number of afflicted and pure dharmas in the three times.

original: las tha dad pa mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa las sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tha dad du bya ba mi skye ba ste /
analyzed: las tha dad pa mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa las sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tha dad du bya ba mi skye ba ste /

translated: Mastery of the world of the vessel refers to five kinds of mastery:

original: gang 'dod pa de kun du ston pa'am mi snang bar byed pa dang / ci 'dra ba 'dod ba de 'dra ba ston pa dang / dus ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du ston pa dang / bsdus pa dang rgyas pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa dang /üîΩji snyed 'dod pa de snyed ston pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'dod pa de kun du ston pa'am mi snang bar byed pa dang / ci 'dra ba 'dod ba de 'dra ba ston pa dang / dus ji srid du 'dod pa de srid du ston pa dang / bsdus pa dang rgyas pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byed pa dang / ji snyed 'dod pa de snyed ston pa'o //
translated: to manifest anything one wishes or to make it disappear; to manifest anything one wishes; to manifest anything one wishes for as long as one wishes; to make things as massive or as minute as one wishes; and to manifest as many things as one wishes.

original: sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de dag gi nang du rang gi lus rnam par phye ba ston pa la dbang byed pa'i phyir sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi 'jig rten la dbang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de dag gi nang du rang gi lus rnam par phye ba ston pa la dbang byed pa'i phyir sbyor ba ste /
translated: Application to mastery of the world of sentient beings refers to the mastery of manifesting one‚Äôs own body in various ways within those worlds.üîΩApplication to mastery of the full enlightenment of transcendent awareness refers to the mastery of manifesting the major and minor marks of perfect form, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, and the like, in whatever way one wishes.

original: gdul ba rnams kyi lus dang sems dang mthun pa'i lus dang sems ston pa'o //
analyzed: gdul ba rnams kyi lus dang sems dang mthun pa'i lus dang sems ston pa'o //
translated: It is the manifestation of a body and mind in accordance with the bodies and minds of those to be trained.

original: ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The application to mastery of the full realization of wisdom is twofold:

original: don dam pa'i ye shes dang / kun rdzob kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: don dam pa'i ye shes dang / kun rdzob kyi ye shes so //
translated: the full realization of ultimate wisdom and the full realization of conventional wisdom.

original: de la don dam pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su mi gcod pas lus su rnam par rtog pa thams @246b cad med pa dang lus mnyam pa nyid thob pa'o
analyzed: de la don dam pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud yongs su mi gcod pas lus su rnam par rtog pa thams @246b cad med pa dang lus mnyam pa nyid thob pa'o
translated: The application to mastery of the full realization of ultimate wisdom is the absence of all conceptual thoughts of a body and the attainment of the sameness of bodies, due to the complete elimination of one's own and others' continuums.

original: // kun rdzob kyi ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / gnyis ka ma yin par shes pa'i phyir sems can dang / snod kyi 'jig rten dang /
analyzed: // kun rdzob kyi ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / gnyis ka ma yin par shes pa'i phyir sems can dang / snod kyi 'jig rten dang /
translated: The application to mastery of the full realization of conventional wisdom is the knowledge of the afflictive, the purified, and neither, due to which one knows the world of sentient beings and the world of their environment.

original: de skye ba'i rgyu las kyi lus dang / theg pa rnam pa gsum gyi ye shes dang / chos kyi lus dang nam mkha'i lus rab tu shes pa'o //
analyzed: de skye ba'i rgyu las kyi lus dang / theg pa rnam pa gsum gyi ye shes dang / chos kyi lus dang nam mkha'i lus rab tu shes pa'o //
translated: The cause of its arising is the knowledge of the body of karma, the body of intuition of the three vehicles, and the body of reality and space.

original: dbang thob pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten dang / ye shes mngon par rdzogs bar byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnam pa gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu thob pa'o //
analyzed: dbang thob pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten dang / ye shes mngon par rdzogs bar byang chub pa la dbang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnam pa gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu thob pa'o //
translated: The phrase attains mastery means that the bodhisattva attains the ten masteries by means of the three kinds of mastery over the world of the vessel, the world of its inhabitants, and the intuition of perfect enlightenment.

original: che ba nyid kyi khyad par zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: che ba nyid kyi khyad par zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The phrase distinctions of greatness refers to three kinds of greatness:

original: ye shes kyi che ba nyid dang / las kyi che ba nyid dang / de gnyis ka'i gnas yon tan gyi che ba nyid do //
analyzed: ye shes kyi che ba nyid dang / las kyi che ba nyid dang / de gnyis ka'i gnas yon tan gyi che ba nyid do //
translated: the greatness of intuition, the greatness of activity, and the greatness of the qualities that are the basis of those two.

original: de la ye shes kyi che ba nyid ces bya ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: de la ye shes kyi che ba nyid ces bya ba ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The greatness of intuition is the possession of inconceivable intuition that does not dwell in either cyclic life or in nirvana.

original: de yang bsgom pa khyad par zhugs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes bya rab tu rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang bsgom pa khyad par zhugs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes bya rab tu rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin no //
translated: Furthermore, it is inconceivable due to the excellence of meditation, it is inconceivable due to the realization of the knowable, and it is inconceivable due to the removal of adverse factors.

original: las kyi che ba nyid ces bya ba ni de lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su song zhing ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma thob shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba ste de yang ye shes
analyzed: las kyi che ba nyid ces bya ba ni de lta bu'i ye shes kyi rjes su song zhing ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma thob shin tu med pa kun du 'byung ba ste de yang ye shes
translated: The greatness of action refers to the fact that, having attained such gnosis and possessing such gnosis, the actions of body, speech and mind that occur are utterly irreproachable.

original: sngon du 'gro ba dang / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas 'byung bar byed pa dang / 'byung ba'i dus na byung bas kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i lam gyis lam yongs su 'dzin pas kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba dang / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas 'byung bar byed pa dang / 'byung ba'i dus na byung bas kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sems can gyi don byed pa'i lam gyis lam yongs su 'dzin pas kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
translated: They are irreproachable because they are preceded by gnosis, because they are produced in accordance with gnosis, because they are irreproachable and unafflicted at the time of their occurrence, because they are irreproachable since they are the path that is taken up by the path that benefits sentient beings,

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi sbyor ba'i rgyus rgyu yongs su 'dzin pas kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sems can gyi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i bya ba sgrub pas kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi sbyor ba'i rgyus rgyu yongs su 'dzin pas kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / sems can gyi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i bya ba sgrub pas kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
translated: It is irreproachable because it is the cause of the accumulation of the roots of virtue of oneself and others, because it is the cause of the accumulation of the roots of virtue of others, because it is the cause of the accumulation of the roots of virtue of both oneself and others, and because it is the cause of the accumulation of the roots of virtue of neither oneself nor others.

original: de gnyis ka'i gnas yon tan gyi che ba nyid ces bya ba ni yon @247a * //
analyzed: de gnyis ka'i gnas yon tan gyi che ba nyid ces bya ba ni yon @247a * //
translated: The greatness of the virtues of the two is the greatness of the virtues of the two.

original: tan rnam pa bdun gi dbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: tan rnam pa bdun gi dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: It is based on the seven kinds of virtues:

original: shin tu brtan pa'i lam gyi yon tan dang / nyams pa med pa'i yon tan dang / ngag phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang / sems phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang / rgyu'i yon tan dang / sbyor ba'i yon tan dang / 'dus pa'i yon tan no //
analyzed: shin tu brtan pa'i lam gyi yon tan dang / nyams pa med pa'i yon tan dang / ngag phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang / sems phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan dang / rgyu'i yon tan dang / sbyor ba'i yon tan dang / 'dus pa'i yon tan no //
translated: the virtue of the path of stability, the virtue of non-deficiency, the virtue of the perfection of speech, the virtue of the perfection of mind, the virtue of the cause, the virtue of application, and the virtue of the assembly.

original: nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The etymology of the divisions is twofold:

original: sa'i nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / gang zag gi nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba ste /
analyzed: sa'i nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / gang zag gi nges pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba ste /
translated: The etymology of the stages, the analysis of the etymology of the stages, and the analysis of the etymology of the person.

original: de ni 'og nas ming la mkhas pa'i skabs su rgya cher ston to //
analyzed: de ni 'og nas ming la mkhas pa'i skabs su rgya cher ston to //
translated: This will be taught extensively below in the section on skill in names.

original: 'bras bu legs pa'i khyad par ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu legs pa'i khyad par ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The excellence of the result is as before.

original: gnas pa dang khyad par de dag thob pas na de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: gnas pa dang khyad par de dag thob pas na de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: By attaining that abiding and distinction, that branch is perfected.

original: mtshan ma med pa nyid du mngon par 'du byed pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa nyid du mngon par 'du byed pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he has transcended the formative action of signlessness.

original: sa dgu pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: sa dgu pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the elimination of the counteragent on the ninth stage?üîΩSince he is unable to attain mastery in teaching the Dharma in all its aspects by means of enumeration, characteristic, etymology and analysis, that branch is not perfected by him.

original: rnam grangs dang mtshan nyid nges pa'i tshig dang rab tu dbye bas rnam pa thams cad du chos ston pa la dbang thob par mi nus pas de yan lag des yongs su ma rdzogs pa yin te zhes bya bas sa dgu pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni sems
analyzed: rnam grangs dang mtshan nyid nges pa'i tshig dang rab tu dbye bas rnam pa thams cad du chos ston pa la dbang thob par mi nus pas de yan lag des yongs su ma rdzogs pa yin te zhes bya bas sa dgu pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni sems
translated: The counteragent to the ninth stage is the mental attention to the Dharma as sound.

original: can gyi don bya ba la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o //
analyzed: can gyi don bya ba la mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o //
translated: It is the absence of the need for application to the performance of the aims of beings.

original: de yang sa brgyad pa la mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa snga ma de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas rang gi ngang nyid kyis rgyun chags su bar chad med par 'jug pa'i lam dang ldan pa la gnas su zin kyang blo gros rgya che ba rjes su
analyzed: de yang sa brgyad pa la mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa snga ma de nyid shas cher bsgoms pas rang gi ngang nyid kyis rgyun chags su bar chad med par 'jug pa'i lam dang ldan pa la gnas su zin kyang blo gros rgya che ba rjes su
translated: Moreover, on the eighth stage, he is already situated in the nondiscriminative path which is uninterrupted and continuous by its very nature, through the cultivation of just that former nondiscriminativeness.

original: thob ste / gzhan dag la chos yang dag par ston pa bla na med pa las brtsams nas chos rnams kyi rnam grangs dang / de'i mtshan nyid dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / rab tu dbye ba rab tu rnam par 'byed mi nus pa nyid yin par sbyor ro //
analyzed: thob ste / gzhan dag la chos yang dag par ston pa bla na med pa las brtsams nas chos rnams kyi rnam grangs dang / de'i mtshan nyid dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / rab tu dbye ba rab tu rnam par 'byed mi nus pa nyid yin par sbyor ro //
translated: But he is not yet able to expound the Dharma to others, beginning with the unexcelled teaching of the Dharma, and to analyze the categories, characteristics, definitions, and divisions of the dharmas.

original: gnyen po bsgom pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gnyen po bsgom pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the cultivation of the counteragent?

original: de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pas zhes bya bas bstan te /
analyzed: de yan lag des yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pas zhes bya bas bstan te /
translated: It is taught by the words, ‚Äúhe strives to perfect that element.‚Äù

original: sa brgyad pa nas sa dgu par 'phar ba'i gnas skabs na smra ba'i brtson pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi dbang du byas pa'i chos thob pas sa brgyad pa las 'phar zhing dgu pa gnon par gyur pa'i chos de @247b
analyzed: sa brgyad pa nas sa dgu par 'phar ba'i gnas skabs na smra ba'i brtson pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi dbang du byas pa'i chos thob pas sa brgyad pa las 'phar zhing dgu pa gnon par gyur pa'i chos de @247b
translated: At the time of ascending from the eighth to the ninth stage, the bodhisattva's effort in teaching is called perfect, because he has attained the Dharma for the sake of self and other, and he ascends from the eighth stage and subdues the ninth stage.

original: la 'bad pa'o //
analyzed: la 'bad pa'o //
translated: He strives in that Dharma.

original: de la smra ba'i brtson pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de ltar ye shes tshad med pas rnam par dpyad pa'i blos byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa gnon pa nas brgyad pa la gnas pa'i khyad par thab pa dang /
analyzed: de la smra ba'i brtson pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de ltar ye shes tshad med pas rnam par dpyad pa'i blos byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa gnon pa nas brgyad pa la gnas pa'i khyad par thab pa dang /
translated: The effort in teaching is called perfect because the bodhisattva, by the mind that analyzes with immeasurable knowledge, subdues the ninth bodhisattva stage and strives for the distinction of abiding in the eighth stage.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / dbang thob pa dang che ba nyid kyi khyad par thob pa tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par gong du ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rim gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu'i chos phun sum tshogs pa la bya'o //üîΩbdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi dbang du byas pa'i chos thob pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa rnams su thar pa thob par 'gyur bar 'du shes ba'i gdul ba bzlog pas gzhan gyi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ma thob pa thob par byed pas bdag gi don la sogs pa'i chos thob pa ste /üîΩde la 'bad pa ni gnyen po bsgom pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / dbang thob pa dang che ba nyid kyi khyad par thob pa tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin par gong du ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rim gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu'i chos phun sum tshogs pa la bya'o // bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi dbang du byas pa'i chos thob pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa rnams su thar pa thob par 'gyur bar 'du shes ba'i gdul ba bzlog pas gzhan gyi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ma thob pa thob par byed pas bdag gi don la sogs pa'i chos thob pa ste / de la 'bad pa ni gnyen po bsgom pa yin no //
translated: The perfection of the cause is the cause for turning the wheel of the Dharma, which is the perfection of the qualities of the bodhisattva who, without being satisfied with merely purifying a buddhaverse, attaining mastery, and attaining the special greatness, goes on to the higher, ever more excellent wisdom.üîΩThe perfection of attainment of Dharma is the attainment of Dharma for one's own and others' benefit. It is for others' benefit because it turns away those disciples who think that liberation is attained in the formless realm. It is for one's own benefit because it causes one to attain the wisdom of the Buddha.üîΩExertion in that is the cultivation of the antidote.üîΩ

original: sa dgu pa la ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bshad pa phun sum tshogs pas gnas pa dang / 'bras bu legs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par bstan pa thob po //
analyzed: sa dgu pa la ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang / spyod pa la 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / bshad pa phun sum tshogs pas gnas pa dang / 'bras bu legs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par bstan pa thob po //
translated: On the ninth stage, he attains the excellence of intuition, the excellence of engagement in the practice, the excellence of teaching, and the excellence of the special result.

original: de la ye shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni chos bshad par bya ba dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa gang dag yin pa de dag shes nas ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la ye shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni chos bshad par bya ba dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa gang dag yin pa de dag shes nas ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The excellence of intuition is the teaching of the Dharma, having understood the virtuous, nonvirtuous, and neutral Dharmas.

original: spyod pa 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa gnas pa dang bcas pa las brtsams pa dang / skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
analyzed: spyod pa 'jug pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni sems can gyi spyod pa nyon mongs pa dang / las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa gnas pa dang bcas pa las brtsams pa dang / skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
translated: The excellence of engagement in the practice is the teaching of the Dharma, having understood the afflictions of sentient beings, their afflicted actions, and their afflicted rebirths.

original: rnam par byang ba la nges pa dang / ma nges par rnam par gnas pa las brtsams te /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba la nges pa dang / ma nges par rnam par gnas pa las brtsams te /
translated: and the definite and indefinite abodes in purification.

original: de dag gi spyod pa thibs po rgyu ba yongs su shes par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi spyod pa thibs po rgyu ba yongs su shes par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of the dense progress of their conduct.

original: bshad pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa de lta bu dag shes nas de bzhin du thar pa'i nye bar sgrub pa nye bar sgrub pa ste /üîΩde @248a * //
analyzed: bshad pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa de lta bu dag shes nas de bzhin du thar pa'i nye bar sgrub pa nye bar sgrub pa ste / de @248a * //
translated: The perfection of explanation is the establishment of the means of attaining liberation in accordance with the various kinds of conduct of sentient beings, having understood them in that way.

original: yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: That is threefold:

original: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang / ngag phun sum tshogs pa dang / smra ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang / ngag phun sum tshogs pa dang / smra ba phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: the perfection of knowledge, the perfection of speech, and the perfection of eloquence.

original: de la ye shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni gang shes nas gang gi dbang du byas te ston pa'o //üîΩgang shes nas ston ce na /
analyzed: de la ye shes phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni gang shes nas gang gi dbang du byas te ston pa'o //üîΩgang shes nas ston ce na /
translated: The perfection of knowledge is the knowledge of the object of expression, the knowledge of the means of expression, and the knowledge of the purpose of expression.üîΩThe perfection of speech is the knowledge of the expression of the object of expression, the knowledge of the expression of the means of expression, and the knowledge of the expression of the purpose of expression.üîΩThe perfection of eloquence is the knowledge of the object of expression, the knowledge of the means of expression, and the knowledge of the purpose of expression.

original: yongs su smin par gyur bas rnam par grol ba'i snod dang / gdul bas rnam par grol ba'i rang bzhin dang / theg pa gsum tha dad pas rnam par grol ba'i rab tu dbye ba shes nas ston pa'o //

translated: it is taught with reference to vessels for the instructions of the antidotes, vessels for the teaching of the Dharma, vessels for the establishment of examples, vessels for the various enumerations, and so on.üîΩWith regard to the perfection of speech,

original: de la ngag phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar ye shes la mkhas pa tshad med pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis mngon par sgrub pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa ste /
analyzed: de la ngag phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni de ltar ye shes la mkhas pa tshad med pa dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis mngon par sgrub pa'i tshig gis chos ston pa ste /

translated: The intrinsic reality of things is the reality included in the spiritual lineages.üîΩThe domain of the intrinsic reality of things is the intrinsic reality of things included in the spiritual lineages, as it is the domain of knowledge.

analyzed: go bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar shes pa'i yul de nyid brjod par go bar byed pa'o //

analyzed: go bar byed pa'i sgo du ma zhes bya ba ni brjod pas gzhan la go bar byed pa de nyid kyi rnam grangs tshad med pa shes pa'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúmany doors of understanding‚Äù refers to the knowledge of the limitless synonyms of that very understanding of others through expression.

original: smra ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: smra ba phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúperfection of eloquence‚Äù refers to four aspects:

analyzed: gzungs phun sum @248b tshogs pa dang / rab tu ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dris pa lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa'o // de la gzungs phun sum tshogs pa dang zhes bya ba ni de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes de la mkhas pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod thos pa chos smra ba chen po byed pa de don dang ldan pa'i gzugs la sogs
translated: the perfection of retention, the perfection of teaching, the perfection of answering questions, and the perfection of upholding.

original: pa gzungs kyi sgo grangs med ba brgya stong phrag bcu thob ste /
analyzed: pa gzungs kyi sgo grangs med ba brgya stong phrag bcu thob ste /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúperfection of retention‚Äù refers to the fact that, in this way, the one who is skilled in the wisdom of the correct and discerning understanding of the Dharma of the TathƒÅgata, who is a great Dharma teacher, attains the ten hundreds of thousands of dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways that are meaningful in terms of form and so forth.

analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag mkhas pa de snyed du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i spobs pa rnam par phye ba'i sgos chos ston pa'o //

analyzed: rab tu ston pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i gzungs thob cing spobs pa thob pas chos kyi gtam bya ba'i phyir 'dug na /

analyzed: chos kyi stan la 'dug cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ste sems can rnams la chos ston pa'o //
translated: He sits on the Dharma seat and teaches the Dharma to sentient beings by means of the analytical knowledges, in accordance with their inclinations.

analyzed: de la skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing de dag re res kyang sgra rnams tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris la /

analyzed: 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni de bas kyang ye shes kyi snang ba 'di lta bu rab tu 'dzin par rtsom ste /
translated: The ‚Äúperfection of retention‚Äù is that he begins to retain the light of wisdom in this way:

analyzed: gal te skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs la /

analyzed: gshegs pa de dag re res kyang de snyed du tshad med pa'i sems can rnams la chos tha dad pa ston la /

analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud re re la yang de nyid du tshad med pa'i chos nye bar sgrub pa nye bar bsgrub ste /

analyzed: sa bcu pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni chos rnams la dbang ma thob pa'o //

translated: Even though they have already acquired the ability to teach the Dharma to others, starting with the unsurpassed, to analyze the categories, characteristics, definitions and classifications of phenomena,üîΩbodhisattvas who are on the tenth level,
